name: Río Seco (Costa Rica)
description:
Approach

Descent

The last pitch is longer than 90m! I had to ascend back up, the lower half in the waterfall. There is then a possible 5.8-9 climbing pitch to reach a tree. You can then abseil at an angle, tree hopping to reach the bottom...

Exit

Red tape

The entrance fee for Cascada Pozo Azul is ¢3000. Maybe you can negotiate a better price since you only use the trail one way. Or you could probably exit via río Pozo Azul

Beta sites

https://www.toroscr.com/rio-seco

Trip reports and media

Background
